::Feline::

She closed her eyes as he touched her cheek. She took a deep breath 
and sighed. "I've just never had anyone tell me that without..." She 
opened her eyes and pulled back.  She looked away from HotRod.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Really? That surprizes me. You are very beutiful, after all.", he 
said,
> touching her cheek, with the back of his hand.
